Weaver/pkg/backend/backend.go.description: The HiddenState type has been consolidated to use yarn.HiddenState instead of a duplicate definition in the backend package. This applies to both backend.go and loom.go in the same package.

Weaver/pkg/concepts/extractor.go.description: The convertHiddenState function has been removed. Sample creation in extractSingle now uses resp.HiddenState directly without conversion since backend types are aligned with yarn types.

Weaver/pkg/runtime/agent.go.description: The Chat method now directly assigns resp.HiddenState to result.HiddenState without manual field-by-field copy, since types are aligned (both use *yarn.HiddenState).
